block.p: A selective listing of state, county and local government events across New Jersey this week. (All dates and times subject to confirmation.) Items should be submitted by mail at least three weeks in advance to the New Jersey Op-Ed Page, The New York Times, 229 West 43rd Street, New York, N.Y. 10036, or by e-mail to njcivic@nytimes.com.
State of New Jersey

West Windsor Department of Education hearing on school costs report. Wednesday from 6:30 p.m. to 9 p.m. Mercer County Community College, 1200 Old Trenton Road. 609-292-6038. Trenton Senate session. Monday at noon. State House Annex Building, 150 West State Street. (609) 292-4840.
Atlantic County
Hamilton Planning Board. Thursday at 7 p.m. Hamilton Municipal Building, 2090 Greenwood Avenue. (609) 890-3674.
Bergen County

Allendale Mayor and Council. Thursday at 8 p.m. Allendale Borough Hall, 500 West Crescent Avenue. (201) 818-4400. Emerson Environmental Commission. Wednesday at 7:30 p.m. Emerson Borough Hall, 1 Municipal Place. (201) 262-6086.
Camden County

Braddock Township Committee. Tuesday at 7:30 p.m. Winslow Township Municipal Building, 125 South Route 73. (609) 567-0700. Braddock Board of Health. Thursday at 7 p.m. Winslow Township Municipal Building, 125 South Route 73. (609) 567-0700. Cherry Hill Township Council. Monday at 7:30 p.m. Cherry Hill Municipal Building, 820 Mercer Street. (856) 488-7892.
Essex County

Caldwell Borough Council. Tuesday at 7 p.m. Caldwell Borough Hall, Provost Square. (973) 226-6100. Montclair Township Council. Tuesday at 8 p.m. Montclair Municipal Building, first floor, 205 Claremont Avenue. (201) 509-4955. Roseland Borough Council. Tuesday at 7 p.m. Roseland Borough Hall, 19 Harrison Avenue. (973) 226-8080.
Hunterdon County
Flemington Board of Chosen Freeholders. Tuesday at 4:30 p.m. Hunterdon County Main Street Complex, 71 Main Street. (908) 788-1102.
Mercer County

Princeton Environmental Commission. Wednesday at 7:30 p.m. Princeton Town Council, 400 Witherspoon Street. (609) 921-1359. Princeton Zoning Board of Adjustment. Wednesday at 7:30 p.m. Princeton Town Council, 400 Witherspoon Street. (609) 921-1359. Trenton City Council. Tuesday at 5 p.m. Trenton City Hall, 319 East State Street. (609) 989-3187. Trenton Planning Board. Thursday at 7:30 p.m. Trenton City Hall, 319 East State Street. (609) 989-3187.
Monmouth County

Belmar Borough Council. Wednesday at 8 p.m. Belmar Municipal Building, 601 Main Street. (732) 681-3700. West Long Branch Environmental Commission. Monday at 6 p.m. West Long Branch Borough Hall, 965 Broadway. (732) 229-1756.
Morris County

Morris Plaines Social Services Board. Thursday at 5 p.m. Morris View III, West Hanover Avenue. (973) 326-7270. Morris Township Park Commission. Monday at 7:30 p.m. Park Commission Headquarters, East Hanover Avenue. (973) 326-7600. Morristown Board of Chosen Freeholders. Wednesday at 7:30 p.m. Administration and Records Building, Court Street. (973) 285-6015.
Passaic County

Wanaque Library Board. Tuesday at 7:30 p.m. Wanaque Public Library, 616 Ringwood Avenue. (973) 839-4434. West Milford Zoning Board of Adjustment. Tuesday at 7:30 p.m. Municipal Building, 1480 Union Valley Road. (973) 728-7000. West Milford Township Council. Wednesday at 7:30 p.m. Municipal Building, 1480 Union Valley Road. (973) 728-7000.
Sussex County

Newton Township Committee. Tuesday at 6:30 p.m. Andover Township Municipal Building, 134 Newton-Sparta Road. (973) 383-4280. Newton Town Council. Monday at 7 p.m. Newton Municipal Building, 39 Trinity Street. (973) 383-3521.
Union County

Berkeley Heights Township Council. Tuesday at 7 p.m. Berkeley Heights, 29 Park Avenue. (908) 464-2700. Berkeley Heights Planning Board. Wednesday at 7:30 p.m. Berkeley Heights, 29 Park Avenue. (908) 464-2700. Springfield Township Committee. Wednesday at 8 p.m. Township of Springfield Municipal Building, 100 Mountain Avenue. (973) 912-2200.
Warren County

Hackettstown Town Council. Wednesday at 7:30 p.m. Hackettstown Municipal Building, 215 Stiger Street. (908) 852-3130. Port Murray Township Committee. Wednesday at 7:30 p.m. Mansfield Township Municipal Building, 100 Port Murray Road. (908) 689-6151.
